RTCPeerConnectionDatachannel_event.summary: A datachannel event is sent to an instance when an has been added to the connection, as a result of the remote peer calling .

blockquote.para: Note: This event is not dispatched when the local end of the connection creates the channel.

remarks.para: This event is not cancelable and does not bubble.
